item.body: Abstract Summer Art Gate Gallery presents a group show of abstract works by veteran artists Prakash Waghmare, Pradeep Nerulkar, Archana Mishra and Gajanan Kabade. Art Gate Gallery, above Satyam Collection, Churchgate; Tel: 022 4213 8855 When: 11 am to 7 pm Painted Rhythm Gallery brings you Subrata Sen's solo exhibition - Mystique Moments. Sen is famed for bringing the canvas alive through his distinctive style of exhibiting women inspired by a Rajasthani backdrop. Kamalnayan Bajaj Art Gallery, Ground Floor, Bajaj Bhawan, Nariman Point; Tel: 9819187697; When: 11 am - 7 pm Richa's collection ranges from vivid corals and sassy reds which cascade into soft peaches, blushing pinks and shades of blue. Kimaya, 2, Asha Colony, opposite Hotel Sea Princess, Juhu Tara Road, Juhu; Tel: 022 2660 6554 Myrah presents the Ricette Beauty Gourmand treatment to give your energy levels a boost and your skin a dose of luxurious pampering. The twohour therapy starts with a body scrub, followed by a relieving cream massage. Myrah Spa, 11 Palm Spring Society, behind Shoppers' Stop Juhu, JVPD Scheme; Tel: 022 26253968 Popley Eternal offers up to 50 per cent off on making charges on an exclusive collection of all gold and diamond jewellery. You also get a 1g gold coin (24 kt) on purchase of diamond jewellery. Popley Eternal, 188/A Turner Road, Bandra; Tel: 022 26511349 When: Till May 11 Auriga has introduced a new refreshing menu — a variety of frappes, coolers and smoothies. Must-tries are their cucumber & black salt frappe, mango & mint cooler and banana & wasabi smoothie. Auriga, Plot no 1B, Famous Studio Lane, off Dr E Moses Road, Mahalaxmi, Tel: 022 43472505; When: Till May 20 Enjoy a burger from the legendary menu along with two beers or a Long Island iced tea and pick a tee from the Hard Rock Shop for Rs 1,550. Hard Rock Cafe outlets in Worli and Andheri; Tel: 022 6651 1209, 12 pm to 1 am
